scripts.dev: concurrently -n "REDIS,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "yellow,blue,green" "npm run dev:redis" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
